membership: Standard Chartered Bank is a corporate member of a number of associations, such as the UK Finance, the Association for Financial Markets in Europe (AFME), the European Services Forum (ESF), ISDA, the FIA, the EU-Asia FInancial Services Roundtable and Eurofi.
goals__remit: Standard Chartered is an international banking group, with around 80,000 employees and a 150-year history in some of the world’s most dynamic markets. For more please refer to our website: www.standardchartered.com
